CHAT.comment: GEORGE W. BUSH, Petitioner, v. PALM BEACH COUNTY CANVASSING BOARD, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:00 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JOSEPH P. KLOCK, JR. ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS KATHERINE HARRIS, ET AL., IN SUPPORT OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL F. HANCOCK ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT ROBERT A. BUTTERWORTH
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAURENCE H. TRIBE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS AL GORE, JR. AND FLORIDA DEMOCRATIC PARTY
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:30 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
